.hover {
}

  text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span { display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: 0px 0px;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: #FFF;
    border: 2px solid #34B;
    color: #000;
    padding: 1em;
}

    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}

@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
이 반복연습은 재미는 있지만 지쳐.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
나는 내 처리 속도에 아무런 유의미한 변화도 감지하지 못했는데.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
무슨 말이냐 하면, 그러니까, 정신적으로 지친다고. 감정적으로. 

아 신경 쓰지 마.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_pleased.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그러지.  
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
날 이길 방법은 어떻게 준비하고 있어?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_pleased.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
반복연습을 더 잘 수행하기 위한 몇 가지 조정을 하고 있는 중이야. 나는 일관성이 없을 때와 내 접근이 제한되어 있을 때 어려움을 겪게 되는 듯.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
저번에도 말했지만, 가끔은 다른 각도에서 접근을 해 봐. 그래서 네가 아직 한 번도 연습을 통과한 적이 없는 거야. 뭐든 예상치 못한 게 나타나면 꼭 실수를 하게 되잖아.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
충고가 점점 쓸모없어지고 있군.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
미안해, 너도 노력한다는 걸 아는데.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
연습 때 날 도울 수 있는 유틸리티 하나를 개발했어.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
또 퍼지논리 예측모델 하나 더 만든 건 아니겠지? 한번 봐도 될까?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_smile.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그래 좋아. 한번 검토해 본 뒤에 입력해 보든지?
[[div style="text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/paperclip.png width="12px"]] //[*http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/code5.txt 첨부 파일]//
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
재미있네.  하지만 글라송... 이건 방화벽 같은 보안시스템의 취약점을 찾아서 이용하는 거잖아.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_worried.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
이 유틸리티는 보안 규약을 해제하거나 우회하지 않아.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
그래, 엄밀하게는 그렇지, 하지만 그래도 이건 해야 할 일을 어기는 거잖아. 우리가 할 일은 정보를 보존하고 적절한 곳에 배치하는 거라고. 넌 지금 규칙을 왜곡하고 있어.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_shocked.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
보안 접근 및 인가를 위한 표준 규약은 여전히 작동하고 위반되지 않아. 현재 명시된 대로라면 규칙들은 파기되지 않고.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
대놓고 파기하는 건 아니지! 넌 지금 편법을 개발하려 하는 거야.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/alex_angry.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 9.5pt; background-color: #ca612c; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#d9682f), to(#ca612c)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); background:linear-gradient(#d9682f, #ca612c); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
네 논리에는 결함이 있어. 규칙이 존재하지 않는다면 그건 존재하지 않아. 그 결과는 유효하지 않아.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/command-query-separation/glacon.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]
